\/D:\/repos\/stride-translations\/pt-BR\: If you're having trouble running Stride, make sure you've installed all the prerequisites:
Se você está tendo problemas em executar Stride, certifique-se de ter instalado todos os pré-requisitos:
If you're having trouble running Stride, make sure you've installed all the prerequisites:
Ferramentas de construção para Visual Studio
Alternatively, uninstall Stride, restart the Stride installer, and install the prerequisites when prompted.
Alternativamente, desinstale Stride, reinicie o instalador Stride e instale os pré-requisitos quando solicitado.
Alternatively, uninstall Stride, restart the Stride installer, and install the prerequisites when prompted.
To check if this is installed, see <g1>Control Panel > Programs > Programs and Features</g1> and look for an entry containing <g2>.NET 4.7.2</g2>.
Para verificar se isso é instalado, consulte <g1>Control Panel > Programas > Programas e Recursos</g1> e procure uma entrada contendo <g2>. NET 4.7.2</g2>.
To check if this is installed, see <g1>Control Panel > Programs > Programs and Features</g1> and look for an entry containing <g2>.NET 4.7.2</g2>.
If it's not installed, you can download it from the <g1>Microsoft Download Center</g1>.
Se não estiver instalado, você pode baixá-lo do <g1>Microsoft Download Center</g1>.
If it's not installed, you can download it from the <g1>Microsoft Download Center</g1>.
If you install Visual Studio, make sure you also install the .Net Framework support.
Se você instalar o Visual Studio, certifique-se de instalar também o suporte .Net Framework.
If you install Visual Studio, make sure you also install the .Net Framework support.
Just the Visual Studio base installation isn't enough.
Apenas a instalação da base do Visual Studio não é suficiente.
Just the Visual Studio base installation isn't enough.
To check if this is installed, see <g1>Control Panel > Programs > Programs and Features</g1> and look for <g2>2015-2019 Redistributable</g2>.
Para verificar se isso é instalado, consulte <g1>Control Panel > Programas > Programas e Recursos</g1> e procure <g2>2015-2019 Redistributável</g2>.
To check if this is installed, see <g1>Control Panel > Programs > Programs and Features</g1> and look for <g2>2015-2019 Redistributable</g2>.
If it's not installed, you can download the 2019 Redistributable from <g1>Visual Studio Downloads</g1> (under <g2>Other Tools and Frameworks</g2>).
Se não estiver instalado, você pode baixar o Redistributable 2019 de <g1>Visual Studio Downloads</g1> (em <g2>Outras ferramentas e quadros</g2>).
If it's not installed, you can download the 2019 Redistributable from <g1>Visual Studio Downloads</g1> (under <g2>Other Tools and Frameworks</g2>).
If you have Visual Studio 2019 installed, you need to have the following workloads and/or components installed:
Se você tiver o Visual Studio 2019 instalado, você precisa ter as seguintes cargas de trabalho e / ou componentes instalados:
If you have Visual Studio 2019 installed, you need to have the following workloads and/or components installed:
<g1>.NET core cross-platform development</g1>, with <g2>.NET Core 2.1 Runtime (LTS)</g2> optional component enabled.
<g1>.NET core cross-platform development</g1>, com <g2>.NET Core 2.1 Runtime (LTS)</g2> componente opcional habilitado.
<g1>.NET core cross-platform development</g1>, with <g2>.NET Core 2.1 Runtime (LTS)</g2> optional component enabled.
On top of that, if you still have Visual Studio 2017 installed, it should be version 15.9+.
Além disso, se ainda tiver o Visual Studio 2017 instalado, deve ser a versão 15.9+.
On top of that, if you still have Visual Studio 2017 installed, it should be version 15.9+.
Build Tools for Visual Studio (only for .NET Framework version)
Ferramentas de compilação para Visual Studio (apenas para versão .NET Framework)
Build Tools for Visual Studio (only for .NET Framework version)
If you <g1>don't</g1> have Visual Studio installed and don't want to install it, you need to install <g2>Build Tools for Visual Studio</g2>.
Se você <g1>don't</g1> tiver Visual Studio instalado e não quiser instalá-lo, você precisa instalar <g2>Build Tools for Visual Studio</g2>.
If you <g1>don't</g1> have Visual Studio installed and don't want to install it, you need to install <g2>Build Tools for Visual Studio</g2>.
You can download this from <g3>Visual Studio Downloads</g3> (under <g4>Other Tools and Frameworks</g4>).
Você pode baixar isso de <g3>Visual Studio Downloads</g3> (em <g4>Outras ferramentas e quadros</g4>).
You can download this from <g3>Visual Studio Downloads</g3> (under <g4>Other Tools and Frameworks</g4>).
Windows uses the Visual Studio installer to install the Visual C++ Redistributable and Build Tools for Visual Studio prerequisites.
O Windows usa o instalador do Visual Studio para instalar o Visual C++ Redistributable e Ferramentas de Construção para pré-requisitos do Visual Studio.
Windows uses the Visual Studio installer to install the Visual C++ Redistributable and Build Tools for Visual Studio prerequisites.
If you don't need Visual Studio, don't worry – it doesn't install it.
Se você não precisa do Visual Studio, não se preocupe – ele não o instala.
If you don't need Visual Studio, don't worry – it doesn't install it.
.NET SDK 5.0 should have been installed by Stride prerequisite installer, if Visual Studio 2019 didn't do it previously.
.NET SDK 5.0 deve ter sido instalado pelo instalador pré-requisito Stride, se o Visual Studio 2019 não o fez anteriormente.
